com.recursivechaos.rcbot.plugins.stoopsnoop.query

Interface QueryDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryDAOImpl

    public interface QueryDAO
    QueryDAO provides a common interface for queries to the database.
    Author:
    Andrew Bell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HashMap<String,Integer> getTopWords(int NumOfRecords, String channel, Timestamp start, Timestamp end) 
      int getWordCount(String searchTerm, String channel)
      getWordCount will search the records for the total number of strings like the searchTerm on the particular channel.
      int getWordCount(String searchTerm, String channel, Timestamp start, Timestamp end)
      getWordCount will search for records for the total number of strings like the searchTerm on the particular channel, given a start and end time

    • Method Detail

      • getWordCount

        int getWordCount(String searchTerm,
               String channel)
        getWordCount will search the records for the total number of strings like the searchTerm on the particular channel.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - String, word or phrase, to query records
        channel - String name of channel to search on (include the '#' char)
        Returns:
        integer of total word count

      • getWordCount

        int getWordCount(String searchTerm,
               String channel,
               Timestamp start,
               Timestamp end)
        getWordCount will search for records for the total number of strings like the searchTerm on the particular channel, given a start and end time
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - String, word, or phrase, to query records
        channel - String name of the channel to seanch on (include the '#' char)
        start - java.sqlTimestamp start of period
        end - java.sqlTimestamp end of period
        Returns:
        integer of the total word count

                                  Timestamp start,
                                  Timestamp end)
